metadata.name: TrustedPath UAC Bypass Pattern
metadata.comment: Detects indicators of a UAC bypass method by mocking directories

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND contains(lower(process.name), lower('c:\\windows \\system32\\')))

output.summary: Detects indicators of a UAC bypass method by mocking directories
